div.p: HAPPY EASTER A BIT EARLY. >>> FINALLY TONIGHT, OBSESSED.
IT’S NOT A GOOD THING WHETHER IT’S A PERSON, FOOD, NEWS STORY,
"THE FACTOR" HAS NOT BEEN REPORTING SPECULATION ABOUT THE
MISSING MALAYSIAN JETLINER. IT’S IMPORTANT BUT DOING AN HOUR
OF UNIDENTIFIED PINGS IS BEYOND MY ABILITY.
I’M MARVELLED THAT OTHERS CAN DO AN HOUR ON UNIDENTIFIED PINGER.
IT TAKES A TALENT TO DO THAT. IF THERE IS SOMETHING SOLID,
YOU’LL KNOW ABOUT IT ON THIS PROGRAM BUT I CANNOT PANLDER TO
PEOPLE’S OBSESSIONS. THAT WOULD BE WRONG.
THAT’S IT FOR US TONIGHT. CHECK OUT THE FOXNEWS.COM
